description:
My apartment is close to public transit, Fordham University, the Bronx Zoo, the New York Botanical Garden, Bronx Little Italy (AKA Arthur Avenue), and City Island. You’ll love the airy, comfortable feel. My place is great for couples, solo adventurers, day trippers, and business travelers.

I'll be easily available by phone. Let me know if you need anything!

You'll be in the Pelham Parkway neighborhood within easy walking distance of the Bronx Zoo, the 2 and 5 trains, and express buses to Manhattan, and a quick ride from the New York Botanical Garden, Bronx Little Italy, City Island, and Fordham University.

Conveniently located near the 2 and 5 subway lines down the west and east sides of Manhattan, MetroNorth to Grand Central or upstate, and express buses to midtown Manhattan. Uber and Lyft are readily available.
name: Bright 1 Bedroom Apt Near Attractions and Transit
review: Great location ! Loved the stay Spacious cozy apartment
